item.title: Man charged after allegedly ramming unmarked police car, threatening officers with knife

item.title: Trump was nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize before. Experts say he's unlikely to win this year
item.description: <p>US President Donald Trump’s bid to win the Nobel Peace Prize has drawn added attention to the annual guessing game over who its next laureate will be.</p>
